name: epicurus
text: A comment left by epicurus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by implode, apocowarg, Carpetbag, RedMange, michellemarie, fakedaisies, RBisme, Panserbjorne)

name: epicurus
text: P.S: I hold a master's degree in philosophy so it is okay if I make fun of it just like it is okay if Irish people say "Paddy".

name: zem
text: Beef looks pretty pleased with his table saw suggestion

name: spinynorman
text: His pose is much like a scholar discussing latin at Oxford or some such.

name: pwb
text: It's his "doing philosophy" pose

name: hyetal
text: Reminds me of his Martha Stewart face.

name: tonyhighwind
text: I dunno, it kinda seems like he's throwing sass.

name: centipede_damascus
text: Don't tell me my motives! How dare you!

name: killerlimpet
text: Teodor has a pretty wicked sack here.

name: dovey
text: Really, it's only simulated sack.

name: biznart
text:
I'd imagine if I was hung like a cranberry, I'd probably rather not go back to that state either.

I said IF I WAS DAMMIT

name: spicyponyhead
text: vestigial sack

name: dejavroom
text: A comment left by dejavroom was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by divot, lamboyster, _cheesekayke)

name: killerlimpet
text: A comment left by killerlimpet was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Thorfinn, fosters, TheLoneliestMonkey, luasn, keithcozz, slalvation)

name: falseprophet
text: Prithee, speak, Teodor, philosopher-king.

name: estutius
text: HOLY SHIT the alt text

name: heavymetaljesus
text: Man, it's Lord of the Rings all over again.

name: steerpike66
text: This is far more like the cod-philosophy of some deranged 70's sci-fi like 'Logans Run' or 'Zardoz': "Fools that we were, we were attempting to eradicate the barbaric impulse from man; now behold what we have wrought!"

name: octafish
text: The penis is bad?

name: omegatron
text: "Evil".  The gun is good.

name: drskradley
text: All 5 of my votes are for panel 9.

name: atmus
text: I always check inside the housings of tablesaws, because people do often leave treasure in them.  It's not always great treasure though.  In fact, it's basically what you would call "Demi-treasure".

name: jamsok
text: What you mean to say is sawdust. Plenty of that inside the 3/4 inch cast iron housing of a Northfield with an 18 inch arbor.

name: spinynorman
text: A lot of the time they just got a wicked-ass saw blade, which I think is pretty sweet. Maybe not treasure, but still pretty fucking sweet.

name: hamscout
text: I don't know what this is, but I want one!

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
i wish to know if that is real.

and i suspend my belief until it Takes my house.

name: capnroblivious
text: German mining equipment.  It's real enough, I just don't remember where I read about this thing.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Blade, arbor, and a big mess of dried tree rosin sprayed all around the inside from whenever pine family boards were cut. Ironically, a table-saw housing is just iron-clad underwear.

name: ggvaidya
text:
"How dare you! You've been incidental here, Ray!"

Just brilliant.

name: saru
text:
It's funny, but it actually does really put me out of sorts when people tell me what my motives are. One of the few buttons that really pushes me.
It was very incidental of those people to tell me what my motivations were.

name: epicurus
text:
The point they're missing is that if everyone used this to become happy, no-one would care that the world was collapsing anyway.

Except women, I guess? Do women have an equivalent for this?

name: charchar
text: Abandoning careers and the world at large to raise children?

name: boredom_man
text: Perhaps if we men had some sort of artificial device which reminded us of the power of our past dongs, we would feel sufficiently secure to institute social orders which forced women to do that!

name: changuitotuerto
text: It's "The Euphio Question" but with dongs.

name: sje46
text:
Yes!
Vonnegut!
Thank you for being someone who likes good writing.

name: drago25
text: This strip reminds me of a particularly awesome episode of the show Black Books - and for that I adore it.

name: kamet
text: Run, Teodor, RUN! Don't let them take your dong enlightenment away!

name: tekende
text: How can Teodor chide Ray for being incidental? Teodor was even more incidental than Ray!

name: laserblade
text:
1) That's the point.
2)Heh, "chide". I thought that said "chode".

name: tripleg
text: Beef looks like Buddha in panel seven.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: pft. he is just doing philosophy.

name: hendetta
text: Teodor! Don't! You're completely ENLIGHTENED AS HELL.

name: mawk
text: am I the only one wondering why these things aren't for sale in the Achewood store?

name: cpnglxynchos
text: 'cos they're simple and could make them for free.

name: mawk
text:
I'm not totally sure, man. some of this sounds like pretty high science to me.

radical science.

name: mangtastic
text: Teodor does not want to give up his ancestral dong because his real dong is hung like a cranberry.
